item.title: 2025 in books
item.description:
After a bad year of reading in 2024, I got back on track in 2025. I read 57 books last year, and I’m happy to say I enjoyed most of them!

Overview

My average rating was 3.73 (on a scale from 0.5 to 5). This can mean roughly two things: either I’m decently good at choosing books I’d like, or I’m not that picky; I’d like to think it’s the former. This is of course also skewed by the fact that if I don’t like a book I’ll just stop reading it and won’t log it as “read”.

item.title: I exist!
item.description:
Here we are! I should have made this website ages ago, but better late than never. :)

This page is generated using Hugo, with the Hugo Bear Blog theme theme. For now this is just hosted on GitHub Pages, but I would like to move it elsewhere sooner rather than later in hopes of having control of as much of my own web presence as possible. Maybe I’ll finally set up that homelab…
